casebody.data:
Alma MAYHUE, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Robert H. FINCH, Secretary of Health, Education & Welfare, DefendantAppellee. No. 93-69. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Nov. 10, 1969. James P. Johnston, of Sowers, Sowers, Carson & Johnston, Wichita, Kan., for plaintiff-appellant. Bernard V. Borst, Asst. U. S. Atty. (Benjamin E. Franklin, U. S. Atty., on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before BREITENSTEIN, HILL and HOLLOWAY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed on the basis of the opinion of the district court. See Mayhue v. Gardner, D.C.Kan., 294 F.Supp. 853.
